OOC: Sandy, I have no problem with Tuscon being adapted for blind fighting.=

It definitely sounds reasonable since that has been his natural state for
=
quite some time. While ranged attacks are typicially more difficult for
bli=
nd beings, having Straight Shot there to help direct those shots,
and Tusco=
n's own personal radar suite does help :)

- Preston

<div>OOC: Sandy, I have no problem with Tuscon being adapted for blind figh=
ting. It definitely sounds reasonable since that=A0has been his natural sta=
te for quite some time. While ranged attacks are typicially more difficult =
for blind beings, having Straight Shot there to help direct those shots, an=
d=A0Tuscon's own personal radar suite does help :)</div>

<div>=A0</div=
>
<div>- Preston</div>
<div>=A0</div>
<div><br>=A0</div>

<div>
<p>OOC: I think Tucson=
 opened his cab doors to let everyone out before he arrived fully at the ar=
k. that may have been overlooked, no problem.<br><br>Okay, here's where=
 it gets interesting.. Tucson is able to fire and hit targets in pure darkn=
ess, seeing that he is blind and has adapted to his disability, simply by s=
harpening up his other senses. Hearing, touch smell, and if need be, taste.=
 It's up to you wether or not that arrow hits Nightrazor in the knee or=
 not. The reason for this shot, is to disable but not destroy. He wants him=
 for questioning, and feels he can get a lot of intel out of him. Then it w=
ill be up to everyone to decide which fate is best for Nightrazor. Rodimus =
will also have a say in what happens, as well as Lord Elder and everyone el=
se. Tucson would like nothing more than to take out Nightrazor, but being a=
n Autobot, he feels that is not the answer to everyone's problems. Nor =
does he have it in his spark to do such a thing. If a decision is to be mad=
e, he feels that he must do so in an intelligent and fair manner and to do =
this, means he has to consult others for advice. Knowing and admitting that=
 your'e not perfect is better than assuming that you are. <br>
